Sentece: The pharmacokinetics profile of the compound can be described by a two-compartment open model, where the absorption and distribution phase were found to be rapid (tmax 0.5-1.0 hour in rats and 1.0-1.5 hours in humans).
Title: [Pharmacokinetics and metabolism of tofizopam (Grandaxin)].
Name: Tofisopam

Sentece: The unchanged tofizopam and 14C-total radioactivity were eliminated from human plasma with a biological half-life (t beta 1/2) of 2.7-3.5 hours and 15-21 hours, respectively, which show a slower elimination of the metabolites.

Sentece: The mean recovery for tofisopam was 69.8% and the inter- and intra-day precision values were well below the 15% limit established for bioanalytical methods.
Title: Gas chromatography nitrogen phosphorous detection (GC-NPD) assay of tofisopam in human plasma for pharmacokinetic evaluation.
Name: Tofisopam

Sentece: The detection limit (2 ng/mL), good precision (CV < or = 4.2%) and speed (total analysis time 24 min) of the present method were sufficient for drug monitoring.
